The issue some of you are having with the serial is that your trying to input it while installing it needs to be input after you have done installing it. 

1. Download Torrent
2. Install using the default key already in the box
3. Complete the updates
4. Click on help on the top of the AVG 2012 and click activate, or reactivate.
5. Enter 8MEH-RQXTV-HQOWD-E447R-MPHYD-PEMBR-ACED just copy and paste it
6. Click activate and voila 2018 license... after this you will have to update some more stuff and install some new features with your new license.
